I have read and done most of what is in FixVideoResolutionHowTo and also >read only< the guidance on http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Dapper_Installation_Guide.  They all ask that I use the command 'aticonfig' which is not defined on my system nor can I find it in a repository.  Anyone knowledgeable abou
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg <-- hit enter until you get to the resolution seciton. Put a check in the resolutions you know your monitor can support
